footer.privacy-policy-1: 1) Consultation with Alternative, Complementary, Integrative Health Experts, and Traditional Medicine Experts: The consultations provided by experts through this platform are intended for informational purposes only. The advice and support offered by these experts constitute their professional opinions and should be regarded as such.
footer.privacy-policy-2: 2) User Responsibility and Coordination with General Healthcare Provider: Users of this platform are advised to consult with their primary healthcare providers, such as a general practitioner, to ensure that the advice received from alternative, complementary, integrative health, and traditional medicine experts aligns with their current health condition and any ongoing medical treatments. The platform does not replace the need for users to seek professional medical advice, and users are encouraged to maintain open communication with their healthcare providers for holistic care.

about-us.comprehensive-guide: The Comprehensive guide to holistic wellbeing
about-us.paragraph-1: VHealTHY is a micro-enterprise aimed at bringing together experts from around the world specializing in various forms of traditional medicine, ranging from ancient practices such as Ayurveda, which emerged over 5000 years ago in India, to more contemporary approaches like homeopathy, naturopathy and hypnosis.
about-us.paragraph-2: The primary objective of VHealTHY is to promote wellbeing by adopting a holistic approach that emphasizes the balance between the body and mind. These traditional methods have withstood the test of time and continue to be widely used worldwide. They are based on self-awareness, understanding the body and its environment, and being mindful of what we integrate into our physical and mental wellbeing, as they are closely interconnected. We have all experienced moments of mental or physical fatigue, points of vulnerability, or a decrease in self- confidence, which leave an impact on our mental, physical, and/or psychological wellbeing. Hypnosis, for example, along with other techniques of realignment and neuro-linguistic programming, allows us to develop powerful mechanisms to prevent and address any obstacles that impede our wellbeing. While these approaches may be considered more time-consuming than modern medication-based solutions, they offer lasting and profound benefits.
about-us.paragraph-3: At VhealTHY, we believe in the importance of caring for our wellbeing by considering its subtleties across all aspects of our lives. By embracing more conscious and engaged lifestyles, VHealTHY aims to support individuals in their journey of self-discovery and optimal wellbeing through personal growth and development, with an understanding of oneself vital needs, including mental and physical health.

contact-us.privacy-policy: By Submitting this form, you agree to the terms of Vhealthyâs privacy policy. Your information will be treated confidentially and will only be used for the purpose of addressing your inquiry.

alternative-medicine.para-1: Traditional medicine encompasses a comprehensive body of knowledge and practices that focus on holistic care, widely recognized and embraced by communities for their role in promoting health and addressing illnesses. Rooted in diverse cultural traditions, traditional medicine is an intergenerational transmission of theories, ideas, faith, and experiences that contribute to its effectiveness and relevance in healthcare.
alternative-medicine.para-2: The effectiveness of traditional medicine extends beyond the treatment of psychosomatic disorders. Traditional medical practitioners possess extensive knowledge of herbs and their organic healing proper ties, enabling them to effectively address various diseases and ailments through natural remedies
alternative-medicine.para-3: Mental health, according to the WHO, is 'more than just the absence of mental disorders or disabilities.' In order to achieve peak mental health, one must not only take care of acute illnesses but also maintain continued wellbeing and happiness. The importance of protecting and regaining mental health on a personal level as well as at the level of a community and society is also emphasized.
alternative-medicine.para-4: Our mental health can be shaped by various factors, including childhood experiences, relationships, financial circumstances, and ot her significant life events. These factors have the potential to influence our emotional wellbeing and psychological resilience, ultimately impacting our overall mental health. In 2021, more than 150 million people in the WHO European Region were found to have a mental health condition, and only 1 in 3 people living with depression were receiving the care they needed.
alternative-medicine.para-5: VHealTHY connects you digitally to certified experts specializing in traditional medicine and mental health from all over the globe, enabling you to take appointments with expert practitioners in
alternative-medicine.para-6: In a general sense, mental health is all about how we feel, think, and deal with life. It's about being happy, maintaining good relationships withself and others, and getting support throughout life, not just in times of distress, to enhance and maintain our wellbeing thus, either directly or indirectly the one of others.
alternative-medicine.para-7: Commencing therapy, also known as psychotherapy or counseling, is the process of meeting with a professional to address issues related to troublesome behaviors, attitudes, feelings, relationship concerns, and somatic reactions (physical sensations). Regardless of the difficulties faced, initiating therapy represents a significant step toward achieving optimal wellbeing and a more fulfilling life.
alternative-medicine.para-8: Through counseling, individuals can address uncomfortable sensations, modify self-destructive behaviors and routines, enhance their relationships, and more. Although the decision to start therapy is not always straightforward due to cost, time commitment, and ongoing mental health stigma, most people can benefit from having an impartial observer who listens and offers guidance.
alternative-medicine.para-9: The advantages of therapy encompass psychological, emotional, physical, behavioral, and life and relationship improvements. Typical benefits include reduced discomfort, improved sleep, enhanced communication, decreased stress, and increased life satisfaction

lifestyle-product.sub-heading: Ancient wisdom, modern solution: a comprehensive guide to holistic well being
lifestyle-product.para-1: Maintaining a healthy lifestyle is paramount for overall wellbeing, significantly influencing the physical body. Adopting habits such as a balanced diet, regular exercise, and sufficient sleep contributes to optimal physical health.
lifestyle-product.para-2: Ayurveda underscores the importance of harmonizing mind, body, and spirit for holistic wellbeing. It emphasizes personalized lifestyle choices aligned with one's unique constitution (dosha) to promote physical vitality and mental equilibrium. By incorporating Ayurvedic principles into daily life, individuals can cultivate resilience, enhance energy levels, and establish a foundation for enduring health and vitality.
lifestyle-product.para-3: Step into the world of Ayurvedic wellness, where ancient wisdom meets modern vitality. Discover harmony and balance with these time-tested Ayurvedic products, crafted to nurture your wellbeing from the inside out.

sdg-media.title: SDG & Media
sdg-media.sub-title-2: The Comprehensive guide to holistic wellbeing
sdg-media.para-1: Through the cultivation of holistic health strategies and personalized interventions, the online platform empowers its users and readers to sustain healthy physical, mental, inter-personal and professional lifestyles, integrate effective coping mechanisms, and embrace sound nutritional practices. It places the individual's wellbeing, encompassing both physical and emotional, in the center
sdg-media.para-2: This empowerment is facilitated by the utilization of cutting-edge digital tools, engagement with healthcare professionals, and the valuable insights contributed by stakeholders, including individuals with disabilities and healthcare experts to optimize every feature of the platform. Thus, it is establishing an all-encompassing and considerate platform that caters to distinct requirements and aligns with the specific domain it serves.
sdg-media.para-3: In essence, the platform equips users to make well-informed health decisions, fostering a sense of assurance, heightened awareness, and increased resilience in their lifestyles.
sdg-media.para-4: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a set of 17 global objectives to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure prosperity for all by 2030. They address major challenges like poverty, inequality, climate change, and more.
sdg-media.para-5: Vhealthy strives to contribute to the achievements of the Sustainable Development Goals set forth by the United Nations in the Agenda 2030. More particularly, Vhealthy plays an active role in the following:-SDG 3 and 10- SDG 8 and 9- SDG 5, 16 and 17
sdg-media.para-6: To promote mental health and wellbeing, V.healTHY provides an online platform gathering global experts in traditional medicine and mental health, equipped with techniques and sharing good practices to increase self-awareness, maintain strong inner foundations by creating a positive environment with oneself and others.
sdg-media.para-7: This entails supporting the healthcare arena, providers as well as the general public to implement sustainable actions while looking closely at the potential for improvement in the digital healthcare system through a digital-lens, inclusive and gender-sensitive approach.
sdg-media.para-8: Each individual needs to exercise their full right of access to a fair living through better health services and information. The online project proves instrumental in helping bridge disparities by offering primary tools for better prevention of life and recovery with fundamental and traditional health standards.
